title: The Walking Dead: Inside Jeffrey Dean Morgan and Norman Reedus bromance
text:
Inside Norman Reedus and Jeffrey Dean Morgan’s heartwarming bromance (Picture: Getty)

Norman Reedus, one of the last surviving original members of The Walking Dead and of course a fan favourite, has completely stolen our hearts with his ongoing Jeffrey Dean Morgan bromance.

While they may hate each other on screen as their characters Daryl and Negan, the duo are the ultimate BFF goals in real life – despite the villain only making his first appearance on the show in 2016.

But after four years of practically living under each other’s skin, the pair have managed to form an unbreakable bond, enough to make the closest of buddies jealous.

And it sounds as though it was love at first sight.

Barely being on the zombie hit for more than five seconds, Jeffrey gushed over his pal back in 2016 when talking on Popcorn with Peter Travers.

It was love at first sight (Picture: Getty)

Our hearts (Picture: Getty Images)

He said: ‘I spend a lot of time with Norman. Not only do we live next to each other in Georgia, but we both have this big affinity toward motorcycles.’

Advertisement

The now 53-year-old added: ‘And we spend a lot of time on the roads. It’s kind of a great way to unwind and we have that in common. So I talk to him daily.’

That’s at least 1460 days, everyone.

And it’s blatantly obvious that their friendship is just as strong (if not stronger) almost half a decade on, after Jeffrey praised his pal when learning he’d picked up two People’s Choice nominations this year.

‘There’s nobody that deserves recognition more… (he’s gonna hate this btw) I love him,’ the star confessed.

They talk to each other daily (Picture: Getty Images)

They’re the ultimate goals (Picture: Getty Images)

‘I think most of us do. He is one of the more special people I’ve ever had the privilege to know… there is no better friend. No one is more loyal, loving, protective, generous.’

You’d think Norm was his pet pooch or something.

Smothering him some more, the father-of-two added: ‘People like Norman? Rare. In fact… there can only be one.

‘I’m so f**king proud of him. Nobody works harder, nobody shows up with more passion, nobody takes more care with their character… and all this? After 10 years of being Daryl Dixon.

‘Bringing that constant intensity to a role after this long is truly amazing.’

Find someone that looks at you the way Norman looks at Jeffrey (Picture: Getty Images)

We’re not crying you are (Picture: FilmMagic)

We’re not crying, you’re crying.

Advertisement

Advertisement

In fact, it was Norman who was crying as he humbly replied to the huge outpouring of love from his acting soulmate.

‘Aw man. Thanks brother I might cry this is really nice of you to say. Love u jeff.’ We have those warm fussy feels in our stomach too.

The pair are not afraid to show their affection for one another on Instagram, the red carpet, and even on set.

And if these pictures weren’t enough to convince you that true love does exist then boy, there is something wrong with the world.

Find someone that looks at you the way Norman looks at Jeffrey, and pray the pair don’t end up killing each other off in the upcoming season of The Walking Dead.

The Walking Dead season 10 kicks off on Sunday 6 October in the US, and returns in the UK on Fox Monday 7 October.
